71674.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「……知ってるか:
Did you know? Salon Fe Lycia is getting ready to open all over the place right now. If you're interested, go to the Salon in the big
city. It's a nice place, me assures you.

71675.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「……アンタの夢は:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I inherited your dream. I'll definitely make
you the coolest new color. So, rest in peace.

71676.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr><turn_pc>「:
Eavesdropping is in poor taste. I'm an apprentice hairdresser, Red Baraba, and I'm here to see my dead friend. <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>
wants to take his life, but he swore to Miss Lycia he'd never swing his fist at her again. You have good eyes. Hey, you <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>,
you wanna take down <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> and get back the Sunset Flag, my friend's memento?

71677.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「へへっ……アン:
Hehehe, I knew you'd say that from the moment I saw the look in your eyes. Alright, I'll leave it to you this time. I'll leave it to
you to make the call this time. The <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> guy is here in the Gert Strait area. I'm counting on you.

71678.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「気持ちは あり:
I appreciate the sentiment, but you have a lot of favors to ask of me. I'll just take it for now. I'll just sit here and gaze at the sky.
Come back when you are free.

71679.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「……だよな。やっぱ:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Right? I guess I'll have to take down my
friend's enemies with my own hands, right? Fe
Lycia, what should I do?

71680.<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>「美容院で使える:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>I want to create new colors that can be used
in salons. That was my dead friend's dream,
and I inherited it and became a hairdresser.<open_irai><bw_break>

71681.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「頼む。アイツの命を:

71682.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr><close_:

71683.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「……待ちわびた:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>I've been waiting for you. I know you got that

71684.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「そうかい。たしかに:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>I see. Indeed, <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> is not so easy

71685.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「……これだ！:
This is it! This is it! This is the Sunset Flag he was carrying when he was attacking the mountain pass with Dolboard! Sorry to bring it
to you so soon, but I have to burn this flag to make a new color. It's sad for me to lose my friend's memento, but that's what he
wanted.

71686.「なあ……空の上から 見てるんだろ。\n アンタのカタキは この人が討ってくれた:
Hey, you're watching from the sky, right? This is the man who killed you. Sunset Flag I'll return you to the sky in a puff of smoke.
Goodbye. Ugh. My eyes are starting to sweat. Now all I have to do is work my magic!

71688.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「はぁ はぁ は:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Ha ha ha ha. Okay! The coolest new Salon
color, the sunset color of a blazing sunset,

71689.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「……アンタには: <attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>I owe you a lot, don't I? Please keep this.

71690.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ダチと アタイ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>The color of friendship between my friends and
me, sunset, can be used anywhere in Salon. You
should try it too.<bw_break>

71691.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「あの日……念願かな:
That day, to celebrate her getting a job at Salon, me and my friends were rolling the Dolboard. However, he couldn't avoid the
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> who strayed into the curve there, and he went headlong into the gutter. Since then, I washed my feet from the
scribbling business and became a hairdresser, inheriting his dream. Heh. I shouldn't get all wet. Thanks for accompanying me on my old
stories. See you.

71692.バラバに\n落日のフラッグを 渡しますか？<yesno><case 1><bre: Would you like to give Baraba the Sunset Flag?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

71696.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「あの 落日のフラッ:
That Sunset Flag has been passed down from generation to generation since the first president of my team, sunset arrow. I, who was
the president at that time, dissolved the traditional Sunset Arrow after the death of my friend who was the flag bearer. The flag was
burned up, but the souls of the dead guy and the members from generation to generation live on in my heart. Forever.

41131.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「えー らっしゃ:
Hello, hello, hello, hello. The reception desk for Gert Strait's famous Strait Bungy is here. If you do the Bungy Janp here, you sometimes
get a tension boost at the start of a battle for 30 minutes, so many people do it before a battle. The cost is 50 gold per try! How about
you try it?
